answers.answer: Hi there!Whether a pump would or would not be best suitable at this time is a decision best taken by your treating endocrinologist. Most leading brands would have good pumps with slight variation in the model. While the choice of the pump should be based on its features and the requirements, I would suggest discussing the situation in detail with your treating endocrinologist before deciding on the pump.Hope this is helpful.Take care!

question: Hi I was wanting an insulin pump but I guess the question would be which is the best brand? Also are there any concerns or questions I should ask when considering a pump? My husband and I are trying to conceive and I feel personally a pump would be best for me. Thanks for the input(:
title: Type one diabetes help!
